51#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
70PatchKernel::PatchKernel(MPI_Comm communicator, std::size_t haloSize, bool expert)
71#else
77PatchKernel::PatchKernel(bool expert)
78#endif
79 : m_expert(expert)
80{
81 // Initialize the patch
82#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
83 initialize(communicator, haloSize);
84#else
85 initialize();
86#endif
87
88 // Register the patch
89 patch::manager().registerPatch(this);
90}

138#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
159PatchKernel::PatchKernel(int id, int dimension, MPI_Comm communicator, std::size_t haloSize, bool expert)
160#else
168PatchKernel::PatchKernel(int id, int dimension, bool expert)
169#endif
170 : m_expert(expert)
171{
172 // Initialize the patch
173#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
174 initialize(communicator, haloSize);
175#else
176 initialize();
177#endif
178
179 // Register the patch
180 patch::manager().registerPatch(this, id);
181
182 // Set the dimension
183 //
184 // Here we can only call the base function, if needed, every derived patch
185 // has to call its derived function.
186 PatchKernel::setDimension(dimension);
187}

195 : VTKBaseStreamer(other),
196 m_vertices(other.m_vertices),
197 m_cells(other.m_cells),

204#endif

207 m_firstGhostVertexId(other.m_firstGhostVertexId),
208#endif

210#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
211 m_nGhostCells(other.m_nGhostCells),
212#endif
213 m_lastInternalCellId(other.m_lastInternalCellId),
214#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1

216#endif

218 m_vtkWriteTarget(other.m_vtkWriteTarget),
219 m_vtkVertexMap(other.m_vtkVertexMap),

227 m_interfacesBuildStrategy(other.m_interfacesBuildStrategy),
228 m_spawnStatus(other.m_spawnStatus),

230 m_expert(other.m_expert),
231 m_dimension(other.m_dimension),
232 m_toleranceCustom(other.m_toleranceCustom),
233 m_tolerance(other.m_tolerance)
234#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
235 , m_partitioningStatus(other.m_partitioningStatus),
236 m_owner(other.m_owner),
237 m_haloSize(other.m_haloSize),
238 m_partitioningCellsTag(other.m_partitioningCellsTag),
239 m_partitioningVerticesTag(other.m_partitioningVerticesTag),
240 m_partitioningSerialization(other.m_partitioningSerialization),

249 m_ghostCellExchangeSources(other.m_ghostCellExchangeSources)
250#endif
251{
252#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
253 // Initialize the communicator
254 initializeCommunicator(other.getCommunicator());
255#else
256 // Initialize serial communicator
257 initializeSerialCommunicator();
258#endif
259
260 // Create index generators
261 importVertexIndexGenerator(other);
262 importInterfaceIndexGenerator(other);
263 importCellIndexGenerator(other);
264
265 // Register the patch
266 patch::manager().registerPatch(this);
267
268 // Update the VTK streamer
269 replaceVTKStreamer(&other, this);
270}

342 // Handle patch regstration
343 patch::manager().unregisterPatch(&other);
344
345 patch::manager().registerPatch(this, m_id);
346 patch::manager().registerPatch(&other);
347
348 // Update the VTK streamer
349 //
350 // Pointers to VTK streamers has been copied, we need to replace all the
351 // pointer to the other object with pointer to this object.
352 replaceVTKStreamer(&other, this);
353
354#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
355 // Handle the communication
356 std::swap(m_communicator, other.m_communicator);
357#endif
358}

365PatchKernel & PatchKernel::operator=(PatchKernel &&other)
366{
367 VTKBaseStreamer::operator=(std::move(other));
368 m_vertices = std::move(other.m_vertices);
369 m_cells = std::move(other.m_cells);
370 m_interfaces = std::move(other.m_interfaces);
371 m_alteredCells = std::move(other.m_alteredCells);
372 m_alteredInterfaces = std::move(other.m_alteredInterfaces);
373 m_vertexIdGenerator = std::move(other.m_vertexIdGenerator);
374 m_interfaceIdGenerator = std::move(other.m_interfaceIdGenerator);
375 m_cellIdGenerator = std::move(other.m_cellIdGenerator);
376 m_nInternalVertices = std::move(other.m_nInternalVertices);
377#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
378 m_nGhostVertices = std::move(other.m_nGhostVertices);
379#endif
380 m_lastInternalVertexId = std::move(other.m_lastInternalVertexId);
381#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
382 m_firstGhostVertexId = std::move(other.m_firstGhostVertexId);
383#endif
384 m_nInternalCells = std::move(other.m_nInternalCells);
385#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
386 m_nGhostCells = std::move(other.m_nGhostCells);
387#endif
388 m_lastInternalCellId = std::move(other.m_lastInternalCellId);
389#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
390 m_firstGhostCellId = std::move(other.m_firstGhostCellId);
391#endif
392 m_vtk = std::move(other.m_vtk);
393 m_vtkWriteTarget = std::move(other.m_vtkWriteTarget);
394 m_vtkVertexMap = std::move(other.m_vtkVertexMap);
395 m_boxFrozen = std::move(other.m_boxFrozen);
396 m_boxDirty = std::move(other.m_boxDirty);
397 m_boxMinPoint = std::move(other.m_boxMinPoint);
398 m_boxMaxPoint = std::move(other.m_boxMaxPoint);
399 m_boxMinCounter = std::move(other.m_boxMinCounter);
400 m_boxMaxCounter = std::move(other.m_boxMaxCounter);
401 m_adjacenciesBuildStrategy = std::move(other.m_adjacenciesBuildStrategy);
402 m_interfacesBuildStrategy = std::move(other.m_interfacesBuildStrategy);
403 m_spawnStatus = std::move(other.m_spawnStatus);
404 m_adaptionStatus = std::move(other.m_adaptionStatus);
405 m_expert = std::move(other.m_expert);
406 m_id = std::move(other.m_id);
407 m_dimension = std::move(other.m_dimension);
408 m_toleranceCustom = std::move(other.m_toleranceCustom);
409 m_tolerance = std::move(other.m_tolerance);
410 m_rank = std::move(other.m_rank);
411 m_nProcessors = std::move(other.m_nProcessors);
412#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
413 m_communicator = std::move(MPI_COMM_NULL);
414 m_partitioningStatus = std::move(other.m_partitioningStatus);
415 m_owner = std::move(other.m_owner);
416 m_haloSize = std::move(other.m_haloSize);
417 m_partitioningCellsTag = std::move(other.m_partitioningCellsTag);
418 m_partitioningVerticesTag = std::move(other.m_partitioningVerticesTag);
419 m_partitioningSerialization = std::move(other.m_partitioningSerialization);
420 m_partitioningOutgoings = std::move(other.m_partitioningOutgoings);
421 m_partitioningGlobalExchanges = std::move(other.m_partitioningGlobalExchanges);
422 m_partitioningInfoDirty = std::move(other.m_partitioningInfoDirty);
423 m_ghostVertexInfo = std::move(other.m_ghostVertexInfo);
424 m_ghostVertexExchangeTargets = std::move(other.m_ghostVertexExchangeTargets);
425 m_ghostVertexExchangeSources = std::move(other.m_ghostVertexExchangeSources);
426 m_ghostCellInfo = std::move(other.m_ghostCellInfo);
427 m_ghostCellExchangeTargets = std::move(other.m_ghostCellExchangeTargets);
428 m_ghostCellExchangeSources = std::move(other.m_ghostCellExchangeSources);
429#endif
430
431 // Handle patch regstration
432 patch::manager().unregisterPatch(this);
433 patch::manager().unregisterPatch(&other);
434
435 patch::manager().registerPatch(this, m_id);
436 patch::manager().registerPatch(&other);
437
438 // Update the VTK streamer
439 //
440 // Pointers to VTK streamers has been moved, we need to replace all the
441 // pointer to the other object with pointer to this object.
442 replaceVTKStreamer(&other, this);
443
444#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
445 // Handle the communication
446 std::swap(m_communicator, other.m_communicator);
447#endif
448
449 return *this;
450}
451
455#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
462void PatchKernel::initialize(MPI_Comm communicator, std::size_t haloSize)
463#else
464void PatchKernel::initialize()
465#endif
466{
467 // Id
468 m_id = PatchManager::AUTOMATIC_ID;
469
470 // Vertex count
471 m_nInternalVertices = 0;
472#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
473 m_nGhostVertices = 0;
474#endif
475
476 m_lastInternalVertexId = Vertex::NULL_ID;
477#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
478 m_firstGhostVertexId = Vertex::NULL_ID;
479#endif
480
481 // Cell count
482 m_nInternalCells = 0;
483#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
484 m_nGhostCells = 0;
485#endif
486
487 m_lastInternalCellId = Cell::NULL_ID;
488#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
489 m_firstGhostCellId = Cell::NULL_ID;
490#endif
491
492 // Dimension
493 m_dimension = -1;
494
495 // Index generators
496 setVertexAutoIndexing(true);
497 setInterfaceAutoIndexing(true);
498 setCellAutoIndexing(true);
499
500 // Set adjacencies build strategy
501 setAdjacenciesBuildStrategy(ADJACENCIES_NONE);
502
503 // Set interfaces build strategy
504 setInterfacesBuildStrategy(INTERFACES_NONE);
505
506 // Set the spawn as unneeded
507 //
508 // Specific implementation will set the appropriate status during their
509 // initialization.
510 setSpawnStatus(SPAWN_UNNEEDED);
511
512 // Set the adaption as unsupported
513 //
514 // Specific implementation will set the appropriate status during their
515 // initialization.
516 setAdaptionStatus(ADAPTION_UNSUPPORTED);
517
518#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
519 // Initialize communicator
520 initializeCommunicator(communicator);
521
522 // Set halo size
523 initializeHaloSize(haloSize);
524
525 // Mark patch as partioned
526 if (getCommunicator() != MPI_COMM_NULL) {
527 setPartitioningStatus(PARTITIONING_CLEAN);
528 } else {
529 setPartitioningStatus(PARTITIONING_UNSUPPORTED);
530 }
531
532 // Initialize partitioning tags
533 m_partitioningCellsTag = -1;
534 m_partitioningVerticesTag = -1;
535
536 // Update partitioning information
537 if (isPartitioned()) {
538 updatePartitioningInfo(true);
539 }
540#else
541 // Initialize serial communicator
542 initializeSerialCommunicator();
543#endif
544
545 // Initialize the geometrical tolerance
546 resetTol();
547
548 // Initializes the bounding box
549 setBoundingBoxFrozen(false);
550 clearBoundingBox();
551
552 // Set VTK write target
553 m_vtkWriteTarget = WRITE_TARGET_CELLS_ALL;
554
555 // Set VTK information
556 std::ostringstream convert;
557 convert << getId();
558
559 m_vtk.setName(convert.str());
560 m_vtk.setCodex(VTKFormat::APPENDED);
561
562 // Set VTK Geom Data
563 m_vtk.setGeomData<double>(VTKUnstructuredField::POINTS, this);
564 m_vtk.setGeomData<long>(VTKUnstructuredField::OFFSETS, this);
565 m_vtk.setGeomData<int>(VTKUnstructuredField::TYPES, this);
566 m_vtk.setGeomData<long>(VTKUnstructuredField::CONNECTIVITY, this);
567 m_vtk.setGeomData<long>(VTKUnstructuredField::FACE_STREAMS, this);
568 m_vtk.setGeomData<long>(VTKUnstructuredField::FACE_OFFSETS, this);
569
570 // Add VTK basic patch data
571 m_vtk.addData<long>("cellIndex", VTKFieldType::SCALAR, VTKLocation::CELL, this);
572 m_vtk.addData<int>("PID", VTKFieldType::SCALAR, VTKLocation::CELL, this);
573 m_vtk.addData<long>("vertexIndex", VTKFieldType::SCALAR, VTKLocation::POINT, this);
574#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
575 m_vtk.addData<long>("cellGlobalIndex", VTKFieldType::SCALAR, VTKLocation::CELL, this);
576 m_vtk.addData<int>("cellRank", VTKFieldType::SCALAR, VTKLocation::CELL, this);
577 m_vtk.addData<int>("cellHaloLayer", VTKFieldType::SCALAR, VTKLocation::CELL, this);
578 m_vtk.addData<int>("vertexRank", VTKFieldType::SCALAR, VTKLocation::POINT, this);
579#endif
580}
581
582#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI!=1
586void PatchKernel::initializeSerialCommunicator()
587{
588 m_rank = 0;
589 m_nProcessors = 1;
590}
591#endif
592
596PatchKernel::~PatchKernel()
597{
598#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
599 freeCommunicator();
600#endif
601
602 try {
603 patch::manager().unregisterPatch(this);
604 } catch (const std::runtime_error &e) {
605 log::cout() << "Unable to unregister the patch" << std::endl;
606 log::cout() << " Error message: " << e.what() << std::endl;
607 }
608}
609
620std::vector<adaption::Info> PatchKernel::update(bool trackAdaption, bool squeezeStorage)
621{
622 std::vector<adaption::Info> updateInfo;
623
624 // Early return if the patch is not dirty
625 //
626 // If we need to squeeze the storage we need to perform the update also
627 // if the patch is not dirty.
628 if (!squeezeStorage && !isDirty(true)) {
629 return updateInfo;
630 }
631
632 // Finalize alterations
633 finalizeAlterations(squeezeStorage);
634
635 // Spawn
636 bool spawnNeeed = (getSpawnStatus() == SPAWN_NEEDED);
637 if (spawnNeeed) {
638 mergeAdaptionInfo(spawn(trackAdaption), updateInfo);
639 }
640
641 // Adaption
642 bool adaptionDirty = (getAdaptionStatus(true) == ADAPTION_DIRTY);
643 if (adaptionDirty) {
644 mergeAdaptionInfo(adaption(trackAdaption, squeezeStorage), updateInfo);
645 }
646
647 return updateInfo;
648}
649
660void PatchKernel::simulateCellUpdate(const long id, adaption::Marker marker, std::vector<Cell> *virtualCells, PiercedVector<Vertex, long> *virtualVertices) const
661{
662 BITPIT_UNUSED(id);
663 BITPIT_UNUSED(marker);
664 BITPIT_UNUSED(virtualCells);
665 BITPIT_UNUSED(virtualVertices);
666
667 throw std::runtime_error ("This function has not been implemented for the specified patch.");
668}
669
677std::vector<adaption::Info> PatchKernel::spawn(bool trackSpawn)
678{
679 std::vector<adaption::Info> spawnInfo;
680
681#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
682 // This is a collevtive operation and should be called by all processes
683 if (isPartitioned()) {
684 const auto &communicator = getCommunicator();
685 MPI_Barrier(communicator);
686 }
687#endif
688
689 // Check spawn status
690 SpawnStatus spawnStatus = getSpawnStatus();
691 if (spawnStatus == SPAWN_UNNEEDED || spawnStatus == SPAWN_DONE) {
692 return spawnInfo;
693 }
694
695 // Spawn the patch
696 spawnInfo = _spawn(trackSpawn);
697
698 // Finalize patch alterations
699 finalizeAlterations(true);
700
701 // Spwan is done
702 setSpawnStatus(SPAWN_DONE);
703
704 // Done
705 return spawnInfo;
706}
707
718std::vector<adaption::Info> PatchKernel::adaption(bool trackAdaption, bool squeezeStorage)
719{
720 std::vector<adaption::Info> adaptionInfo;
721
722 // Check adaption status
723 AdaptionStatus adaptionStatus = getAdaptionStatus(true);
724 if (adaptionStatus == ADAPTION_UNSUPPORTED || adaptionStatus == ADAPTION_CLEAN) {
725 return adaptionInfo;
726 } else if (adaptionStatus != ADAPTION_DIRTY) {
727 throw std::runtime_error ("An adaption is already in progress.");
728 }
729
730 adaptionPrepare(false);
731
732 adaptionInfo = adaptionAlter(trackAdaption, squeezeStorage);
733
734 adaptionCleanup();
735
736 return adaptionInfo;
737}
738
752std::vector<adaption::Info> PatchKernel::adaptionPrepare(bool trackAdaption)
753{
754 std::vector<adaption::Info> adaptionInfo;
755
756 // Check adaption status
757 AdaptionStatus adaptionStatus = getAdaptionStatus(true);
758 if (adaptionStatus == ADAPTION_UNSUPPORTED || adaptionStatus == ADAPTION_CLEAN) {
759 return adaptionInfo;
760 } else if (adaptionStatus != ADAPTION_DIRTY) {
761 throw std::runtime_error ("An adaption is already in progress.");
762 }
763
764 // Execute the adaption preparation
765 adaptionInfo = _adaptionPrepare(trackAdaption);
766
767 // Update the status
768 setAdaptionStatus(ADAPTION_PREPARED);
769
770 return adaptionInfo;
771}
772
788std::vector<adaption::Info> PatchKernel::adaptionAlter(bool trackAdaption, bool squeezeStorage)
789{
790 std::vector<adaption::Info> adaptionInfo;
791
792 // Check adaption status
793 AdaptionStatus adaptionStatus = getAdaptionStatus();
794 if (adaptionStatus == ADAPTION_UNSUPPORTED || adaptionStatus == ADAPTION_CLEAN) {
795 return adaptionInfo;
796 } else if (adaptionStatus != ADAPTION_PREPARED) {
797 throw std::runtime_error ("The prepare function has not been called.");
798 }
799
800 // Adapt the patch
801 adaptionInfo = _adaptionAlter(trackAdaption);
802
803 // Finalize patch alterations
804 finalizeAlterations(squeezeStorage);
805
806 // Update the status
807 setAdaptionStatus(ADAPTION_ALTERED);
808
809 return adaptionInfo;
810}
811
817void PatchKernel::adaptionCleanup()
818{
819 AdaptionStatus adaptionStatus = getAdaptionStatus();
820 if (adaptionStatus == ADAPTION_UNSUPPORTED || adaptionStatus == ADAPTION_CLEAN) {
821 return;
822 } else if (adaptionStatus == ADAPTION_PREPARED) {
823 throw std::runtime_error ("It is not yet possible to abort an adaption.");
824 } else if (adaptionStatus != ADAPTION_ALTERED) {
825 throw std::runtime_error ("The alter function has not been called.");
826 }
827
828 // Complete the adaption
829 _adaptionCleanup();
830
831 // Update the status
832 setAdaptionStatus(ADAPTION_CLEAN);
833}
834
839void PatchKernel::settleAdaptionMarkers()
840{
841 // Nothing to do
842}
843
850void PatchKernel::finalizeAlterations(bool squeezeStorage)
851{
852 // Flush vertex data structures
853 m_vertices.flush();
854
855 // Update bounding box
856 bool boundingBoxDirty = isBoundingBoxDirty();
857 if (boundingBoxDirty) {
858 updateBoundingBox();
859 }
860
861 // Flush cell data structures
862 m_cells.flush();
863
864 // Update adjacencies
865 bool adjacenciesDirty = areAdjacenciesDirty();
866 if (adjacenciesDirty) {
867 updateAdjacencies();
868 }
869
870 // Update interfaces
871 bool interfacesDirty = areInterfacesDirty();
872 if (interfacesDirty) {
873 updateInterfaces();
874 }
875
876 // Flush interfaces data structures
877 m_interfaces.flush();
878
879#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
880 // Update partitioning information
881 bool partitioningInfoDirty = arePartitioningInfoDirty();
882 if (partitioningInfoDirty) {
883 updatePartitioningInfo(true);
884 }
885#endif
886
887 // Clear alteration flags
888 m_alteredCells.clear();
889 m_alteredInterfaces.clear();
890
891 // Squeeze the patch
892 if (squeezeStorage) {
893 squeeze();
894 }
895
896 // Synchronize storage
897 m_cells.sync();
898 m_interfaces.sync();
899 m_vertices.sync();
900}

978void PatchKernel::reset()
979{
980 resetVertices();
981 resetCells();
982 resetInterfaces();
983}
984
988void PatchKernel::resetVertices()
989{
990 m_vertices.clear();
991 if (m_vertexIdGenerator) {
992 m_vertexIdGenerator->reset();
993 }
994 m_nInternalVertices = 0;
995#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
996 m_nGhostVertices = 0;
997#endif
998 m_lastInternalVertexId = Vertex::NULL_ID;
999#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1000 m_firstGhostVertexId = Vertex::NULL_ID;
1001#endif
1002
1003 for (auto &cell : m_cells) {
1004 cell.unsetConnect();
1005 }
1006}
1007
1011void PatchKernel::resetCells()
1012{
1013 m_cells.clear();
1014 if (m_cellIdGenerator) {
1015 m_cellIdGenerator->reset();
1016 }
1017 m_nInternalCells = 0;
1018#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1019 m_nGhostCells = 0;
1020#endif
1021 m_lastInternalCellId = Cell::NULL_ID;
1022#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1023 m_firstGhostCellId = Cell::NULL_ID;
1024#endif
1025
1026#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1027 clearGhostCellsInfo();
1028 clearGhostVerticesInfo();
1029#endif
1030
1031 resetAdjacencies();
1032
1033 for (auto &interface : m_interfaces) {
1034 interface.unsetNeigh();
1035 interface.unsetOwner();
1036 }
1037
1038 m_alteredCells.clear();
1039}
1040
1047void PatchKernel::resetInterfaces()
1048{
1049 // Early return if no interfaces have been built
1050 if (getInterfacesBuildStrategy() == INTERFACES_NONE) {
1051 return;
1052 }
1053
1054 // Prune stale interfaces
1055 pruneStaleInterfaces();
1056
1057 // Reset the interfaces
1058 _resetInterfaces(false);
1059
1060 // All remaining interfaces will be deleted
1061 setInterfaceAlterationFlags(FLAG_DELETED);
1062
1063 // Mark cell interfaces as dirty
1064 setCellAlterationFlags(FLAG_INTERFACES_DIRTY);
1065}
1066
1076void PatchKernel::_resetInterfaces(bool release)
1077{
1078 for (auto &cell : m_cells) {
1079 cell.resetInterfaces(!release);
1080 }
1081
1082 m_interfaces.clear(release);
1083 if (m_interfaceIdGenerator) {
1084 m_interfaceIdGenerator->reset();
1085 }
1086}

1219
1223void PatchKernel::_writePrepare()
1224{
1225 // Get VTK cell count
1226 long vtkCellCount = 0;
1227 if (m_vtkWriteTarget == WRITE_TARGET_CELLS_ALL) {
1228 vtkCellCount = getCellCount();
1229#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1230 } else if (m_vtkWriteTarget == WRITE_TARGET_CELLS_INTERNAL) {
1231 vtkCellCount = getInternalCellCount();
1232#endif
1233 }
1234
1235 // Set the dimensions of the mesh
1236 //
1237 // Even if there is just a single process that needs to write the VTK face stream, than
1238 // all the processes need to write the face stream as well (even the processes whose
1239 // local cells don't require the face steam).
1240 PiercedStorage<bool, long> vertexWriteFlag(1, &m_vertices);
1241 vertexWriteFlag.fill(false);
1242
1243 bool vtkFaceStreamNeeded = false;
1244 for (const Cell &cell : m_cells) {
1245 if (cell.getDimension() > 2 && !cell.hasInfo()) {
1246 vtkFaceStreamNeeded = true;
1247 break;
1248 }
1249 }
1250
1251#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1252 if (isPartitioned()) {
1253 const auto &communicator = getCommunicator();
1254 MPI_Allreduce(MPI_IN_PLACE, &vtkFaceStreamNeeded, 1, MPI_C_BOOL, MPI_LOR, communicator);
1255 }
1256#endif
1257
1258 long vtkConnectSize = 0;
1259 long vtkFaceStreamSize = 0;
1260 for (const Cell &cell : getVTKCellWriteRange()) {
1261 ConstProxyVector<long> cellVertexIds = cell.getVertexIds();
1262 const int nCellVertices = cellVertexIds.size();
1263 for (int k = 0; k < nCellVertices; ++k) {
1264 long vertexId = cellVertexIds[k];
1265 vertexWriteFlag.at(vertexId) = true;
1266 }
1267
1268 vtkConnectSize += nCellVertices;
1269 if (vtkFaceStreamNeeded) {
1270 if (cell.getDimension() <= 2 || cell.hasInfo()) {
1271 vtkFaceStreamSize += 1;
1272 } else {
1273 vtkFaceStreamSize += cell.getFaceStreamSize();
1274 }
1275 }
1276 }
1277
1278 int vtkVertexCount = 0;
1279 m_vtkVertexMap.unsetKernel();
1280 m_vtkVertexMap.setStaticKernel(&m_vertices);
1281 VertexConstIterator endItr = vertexConstEnd();
1282 for (VertexConstIterator itr = vertexConstBegin(); itr != endItr; ++itr) {
1283 std::size_t vertexRawId = itr.getRawIndex();
1284 if (vertexWriteFlag.rawAt(vertexRawId)) {
1285 m_vtkVertexMap.rawAt(vertexRawId) = vtkVertexCount++;
1286 } else {
1287 m_vtkVertexMap.rawAt(vertexRawId) = Vertex::NULL_ID;
1288 }
1289 }
1290
1291 m_vtk.setDimensions(vtkCellCount, vtkVertexCount, vtkConnectSize, vtkFaceStreamSize);
1292}
1293
1297void PatchKernel::_writeFinalize()
1298{
1299 // Nothing to do
1300}

1343PatchKernel::AdaptionStatus PatchKernel::getAdaptionStatus(bool global) const
1344{
1345 int adaptionStatus = static_cast<int>(m_adaptionStatus);
1346
1347#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1348 if (global && isPartitioned()) {
1349 const auto &communicator = getCommunicator();
1350 MPI_Allreduce(MPI_IN_PLACE, &adaptionStatus, 1, MPI_INT, MPI_MAX, communicator);
1351 }
1352#else
1353 BITPIT_UNUSED(global);
1354#endif
1355
1356 return static_cast<AdaptionStatus>(adaptionStatus);
1357}

1365{
1366 m_adaptionStatus = status;
1367}
1368
1377bool PatchKernel::isDirty(bool global) const
1378{
1379#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==0
1380 BITPIT_UNUSED(global);
1381#endif
1382
1383 bool isDirty = false;
1384
1385 if (!isDirty) {
1386 isDirty |= areAdjacenciesDirty(false);
1387 }
1388
1389 if (!isDirty) {
1390 isDirty |= !m_alteredCells.empty();
1391 }
1392
1393 if (!isDirty) {
1394 isDirty |= areInterfacesDirty(false);
1395 assert(isDirty || m_alteredInterfaces.empty());
1396 }
1397
1398 if (!isDirty) {
1399 isDirty |= (getSpawnStatus() == SPAWN_NEEDED);
1400 }
1401
1402 if (!isDirty) {
1403 isDirty |= (getAdaptionStatus(false) == ADAPTION_DIRTY);
1404 }
1405
1406 if (!isDirty) {
1407 isDirty |= isBoundingBoxDirty(false);
1408 }
1409
1410#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1411 if (!isDirty) {
1412 isDirty |= arePartitioningInfoDirty(false);
1413 }
1414#endif
1415
1416 if (!isDirty) {
1417 isDirty |= !m_vertices.isSynced();
1418 }
1419
1420 if (!isDirty) {
1421 isDirty |= !m_cells.isSynced();
1422 }
1423
1424 if (!isDirty) {
1425 isDirty |= !m_interfaces.isSynced();
1426 }
1427
1428#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1429 // Get the global flag
1430 if (global && isPartitioned()) {
1431 const auto &communicator = getCommunicator();
1432 MPI_Allreduce(MPI_IN_PLACE, &isDirty, 1, MPI_C_BOOL, MPI_LOR, communicator);
1433 }
1434#endif
1435
1436 return isDirty;
1437}

1610void PatchKernel::createVertexIndexGenerator(bool populate)
1611{
1612 // Create or reset index generator
1613 if (!m_vertexIdGenerator) {
1614 m_vertexIdGenerator = std::unique_ptr<IndexGenerator<long>>(new IndexGenerator<long>());
1615 } else {
1616 m_vertexIdGenerator->reset();
1617 }
1618
1619 // Populate index generator with current ids
1620 if (populate) {
1621 VertexConstIterator beginItr = m_vertices.cbegin();
1622 VertexConstIterator endItr = m_vertices.cend();
1623 for (VertexConstIterator itr = beginItr; itr != endItr; ++itr) {
1624 m_vertexIdGenerator->setAssigned(itr.getId());
1625 }
1626 }
1627}

1637void PatchKernel::importVertexIndexGenerator(const PatchKernel &source)
1638{
1639 if (source.m_vertexIdGenerator) {
1640 m_vertexIdGenerator = std::unique_ptr<IndexGenerator<long>>(new IndexGenerator<long>(*(source.m_vertexIdGenerator)));
1641 } else {
1642 m_vertexIdGenerator.reset();
1643 }
1644}

1854PatchKernel::VertexIterator PatchKernel::addVertex(const Vertex &source, long id)
1855{
1856 Vertex vertex = source;
1857 vertex.setId(id);
1858
1859 return addVertex(std::move(vertex), id);
1860}
1861
1879PatchKernel::VertexIterator PatchKernel::addVertex(Vertex &&source, long id)
1880{
1881 // Get the id
1882 if (id < 0) {
1883 id = source.getId();
1884 }
1885
1886 // Add a dummy vertex
1887 //
1888 // It is not possible to directly add the source into the storage. First a
1889 // dummy vertex is created and then that vertex is replaced with the source.
1890 //
1891 // The corrdinates of the dummy vertex shuold match the coordinates of the
1892 // source, because the bounding box of the patch is updated every time a
1893 // new vertex is added.
1894 VertexIterator iterator = _addInternalVertex(source.getCoords(), id);
1895
1896 // Replace the newly created vertex with the source
1897 //
1898 // Before replacing the newly created vertex we need to set the id
1899 // of the source to the id that has been assigned to the newly created
1900 // vertex, we also need to mark the vertex as internal.
1901 source.setId(iterator->getId());
1902 source.setInterior(true);
1903
1904 Vertex &vertex = (*iterator);
1905 vertex = std::move(source);
1906
1907 return iterator;
1908}
1909
1928PatchKernel::VertexIterator PatchKernel::addVertex(const std::array<double, 3> &coords, long id)
1929{
1930 if (!isExpert()) {
1931 return vertexEnd();
1932 }
1933
1934 // Add the vertex
1935 VertexIterator iterator = _addInternalVertex(coords, id);
1936
1937 return iterator;
1938}
1939
1954PatchKernel::VertexIterator PatchKernel::_addInternalVertex(const std::array<double, 3> &coords, long id)
1955{
1956 // Get the id
1957 if (m_vertexIdGenerator) {
1958 if (id < 0) {
1959 id = m_vertexIdGenerator->generate();
1960 } else {
1961 m_vertexIdGenerator->setAssigned(id);
1962 }
1963 } else if (id < 0) {
1964 throw std::runtime_error("No valid id has been provided for the vertex.");
1965 }
1966
1967 // Get the id of the vertex before which the new vertex should be inserted
1968#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1969 //
1970 // If there are ghosts vertices, the internal vertex should be inserted
1971 // before the first ghost vertex.
1972#endif
1973 long referenceId;
1974#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1975 referenceId = m_firstGhostVertexId;
1976#else
1977 referenceId = Vertex::NULL_ID;
1978#endif
1979
1980 // Create the vertex
1981 VertexIterator iterator;
1982 if (referenceId == Vertex::NULL_ID) {
1983 iterator = m_vertices.emreclaim(id, id, coords, true);
1984 } else {
1985 iterator = m_vertices.emreclaimBefore(referenceId, id, id, coords, true);
1986 }
1987 m_nInternalVertices++;
1988
1989 // Update the id of the last internal vertex
1990 if (m_lastInternalVertexId < 0) {
1991 m_lastInternalVertexId = id;
1992 } else if (m_vertices.rawIndex(m_lastInternalVertexId) < m_vertices.rawIndex(id)) {
1993 m_lastInternalVertexId = id;
1994 }
1995
1996 // Update the bounding box
1997 addPointToBoundingBox(iterator->getCoords());
1998
1999#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
2000 // Set partitioning information as dirty
2001 setPartitioningInfoDirty(true);
2002#endif
2003
2004 return iterator;
2005}
2006
2007#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==0
2018PatchKernel::VertexIterator PatchKernel::restoreVertex(const std::array<double, 3> &coords, long id)
2019{
2020 if (!isExpert()) {
2021 return vertexEnd();
2022 }
2023
2024 VertexIterator iterator = m_vertices.find(id);
2025 if (iterator == m_vertices.end()) {
2026 throw std::runtime_error("Unable to restore the specified vertex: the kernel doesn't contain an entry for that vertex.");
2027 }
2028
2029 _restoreInternalVertex(iterator, coords);
2030
2031 return iterator;
2032}
2033#endif
2034
2041void PatchKernel::_restoreInternalVertex(const VertexIterator &iterator, const std::array<double, 3> &coords)
2042{
2043 // Restore the vertex
2044 //
2045 // There is no need to set the id of the vertex as assigned, because
2046 // also the index generator will be restored.
2047 Vertex &vertex = *iterator;
2048 vertex.initialize(iterator.getId(), coords, true);
2049 m_nInternalVertices++;
2050
2051 // Update the bounding box
2052 addPointToBoundingBox(vertex.getCoords());
2053}
2054
2060bool PatchKernel::deleteVertex(long id)
2061{
2062 if (!isExpert()) {
2063 return false;
2064 }
2065
2066 // Delete the vertex
2067#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
2068 const Vertex &vertex = m_vertices[id];
2069 bool isInternal = vertex.isInterior();
2070 if (isInternal) {
2071 _deleteInternalVertex(id);
2072 } else {
2073 _deleteGhostVertex(id);
2074 }
2075#else
2076 _deleteInternalVertex(id);
2077#endif
2078
2079 return true;
2080}
2081
2087void PatchKernel::_deleteInternalVertex(long id)
2088{
2089 // Update the bounding box
2090 const Vertex &vertex = m_vertices[id];
2091 removePointFromBoundingBox(vertex.getCoords());
2092
2093 // Delete vertex
2094 m_vertices.erase(id, true);
2095 m_nInternalVertices--;
2096 if (id == m_lastInternalVertexId) {
2097 updateLastInternalVertexId();
2098 }
2099
2100 // Vertex id is no longer used
2101 if (m_vertexIdGenerator) {
2102 m_vertexIdGenerator->trash(id);
2103 }
2104}
2105
2113long PatchKernel::countFreeVertices() const
2114{
2115 return countBorderVertices();
2116}
2117
2125long PatchKernel::countBorderVertices() const
2126{
2127 std::unordered_set<long> borderVertices;
2128 for (const Cell &cell : m_cells) {
2129 int nCellFaces = cell.getFaceCount();
2130 for (int i = 0; i < nCellFaces; ++i) {
2131 if (!cell.isFaceBorder(i)) {
2132 continue;
2133 }
2134
2135 int nFaceVertices = cell.getFaceVertexCount(i);
2136 for (int k = 0; k < nFaceVertices; ++k) {
2137 long faceVertexId = cell.getFaceVertexId(i, k);
2138 borderVertices.insert(faceVertexId);
2139 }
2140 }
2141 }
2142
2143 return borderVertices.size();
2144}
2145
2153long PatchKernel::countOrphanVertices() const
2154{
2155 std::unordered_set<long> usedVertices;
2156 for (const Cell &cell : m_cells) {
2157 ConstProxyVector<long> cellVertexIds = cell.getVertexIds();
2158 int nCellVertices = cellVertexIds.size();
2159 for (int i = 0; i < nCellVertices; ++i) {
2160 usedVertices.insert(cellVertexIds[i]);
2161 }
2162 }
2163
2164 return (getVertexCount() - usedVertices.size());
2165}
2166
2174std::vector<long> PatchKernel::findOrphanVertices()
2175{
2176 VertexConstIterator beginItr = m_vertices.cbegin();
2177 VertexConstIterator endItr = m_vertices.cend();
2178
2179 // Detect used vertices
2180 PiercedStorage<bool, long> vertexUsedFlag(1, &m_vertices);
2181 vertexUsedFlag.fill(false);
2182 for (const Cell &cell : m_cells) {
2183 ConstProxyVector<long> cellVertexIds = cell.getVertexIds();
2184 int nCellVertices = cellVertexIds.size();
2185 for (int j = 0; j < nCellVertices; ++j) {
2186 long vertexId = cellVertexIds[j];
2187 vertexUsedFlag[vertexId] = true;
2188 }
2189 }
2190
2191 // Count the orphan vertices
2192 std::size_t nOrhpanVertices = 0;
2193 for (VertexConstIterator itr = beginItr; itr != endItr; ++itr) {
2194 std::size_t vertexRawIndex = itr.getRawIndex();
2195 if (!vertexUsedFlag.rawAt(vertexRawIndex)) {
2196 ++nOrhpanVertices;
2197 }
2198 }
2199
2200 // Build a list of unused vertices
2201 std::vector<long> orhpanVertices(nOrhpanVertices);
2202
2203 std::size_t orphanVertexIndex = 0;
2204 for (VertexConstIterator itr = beginItr; itr != endItr; ++itr) {
2205 std::size_t vertexRawIndex = itr.getRawIndex();
2206 if (!vertexUsedFlag.rawAt(vertexRawIndex)) {
2207 orhpanVertices[orphanVertexIndex] = itr.getId();
2208 ++orphanVertexIndex;
2209 }
2210 }
2211
2212 return orhpanVertices;
2213}
2214
2218bool PatchKernel::deleteOrphanVertices()
2219{
2220 if (!isExpert()) {
2221 return false;
2222 }
2223
2224 std::vector<long> list = findOrphanVertices();
2225 deleteVertices(list);
2226 updateBoundingBox();
2227
2228 return true;
2229}
2230
2237std::vector<long> PatchKernel::collapseCoincidentVertices()
2238{
2239 std::vector<long> collapsedVertices;
2240 if (!isExpert()) {
2241 return collapsedVertices;
2242 }
2243
2244 long nVertices = getVertexCount();
2245 if (nVertices == 0) {
2246 return collapsedVertices;
2247 }
2248
2249 // Update bounding box
2250 updateBoundingBox();
2251
2252 //
2253 // Collapse double vertices
2254 //
2255 Vertex::Less vertexLess(10 * std::numeric_limits<double>::epsilon());
2256 auto rawVertexLess = [this, &vertexLess](const std::size_t &i, const std::size_t &j)
2257 {
2258 return vertexLess(this->m_vertices.rawAt(i), this->m_vertices.rawAt(j));
2259 };
2260 std::set<std::size_t, decltype(rawVertexLess)> vertexTree(rawVertexLess);
2261
2262 std::unordered_map<long, long> vertexMap;
2263 for (VertexConstIterator vertexItr = m_vertices.cbegin(); vertexItr != m_vertices.cend(); ++vertexItr) {
2264 std::size_t vertexRawId = vertexItr.getRawIndex();
2265 auto vertexTreeItr = vertexTree.find(vertexRawId);
2266 if (vertexTreeItr == vertexTree.end()) {
2267 vertexTree.insert(vertexRawId);
2268 } else {
2269 long vertexId = vertexItr.getId();
2270 long vertexCoincidentId = m_vertices.rawFind(*vertexTreeItr).getId();
2271 vertexMap.insert({vertexId, vertexCoincidentId});
2272 }
2273 }
2274
2275 // Collapse vertices
2276 if (!vertexMap.empty()) {
2277 // Update cells
2278 //
2279 // If the adjacencies are currently up-to-date, they should kept up-to-date.
2280 AdjacenciesBuildStrategy adjacenciesBuildStrategy = getAdjacenciesBuildStrategy();
2281
2282 bool keepAdjacenciesUpToDate;
2283 if (adjacenciesBuildStrategy != ADJACENCIES_NONE) {
2284 keepAdjacenciesUpToDate = (!areAdjacenciesDirty());
2285 } else {
2286 keepAdjacenciesUpToDate = false;
2287 }
2288
2289 for (Cell &cell : m_cells) {
2290 // Renumber cell vertices
2291 int nRenumberedVertices = cell.renumberVertices(vertexMap);
2292
2293 // Mark adjacencies are dirty
2294 //
2295 // If some vertices have been renumbered, the adjacencies of the cells
2296 // are now dirty.
2297 if ((adjacenciesBuildStrategy != ADJACENCIES_NONE) && (nRenumberedVertices > 0)) {
2298 setCellAlterationFlags(cell.getId(), FLAG_ADJACENCIES_DIRTY);
2299 }
2300 }
2301
2302 if (keepAdjacenciesUpToDate) {
2303 updateAdjacencies();
2304 }
2305
2306 // Update interface
2307 for (Interface &interface : m_interfaces) {
2308 // Renumber interface vertices
2309 interface.renumberVertices(vertexMap);
2310 }
2311
2312 // Create the list of collapsed vertices
2313 collapsedVertices.resize(vertexMap.size());
2314
2315 std::size_t k = 0;
2316 for (const auto &entry : vertexMap) {
2317 collapsedVertices[k++] = entry.first;
2318 }
2319 }
2320
2321 return collapsedVertices;
2322}
2323
2327bool PatchKernel::deleteCoincidentVertices()
2328{
2329 if (!isExpert()) {
2330 return false;
2331 }
2332
2333 std::vector<long> verticesToDelete = collapseCoincidentVertices();
2334 deleteVertices(verticesToDelete);
2335
2336 return true;
2337}

2403void PatchKernel::updateLastInternalVertexId()
2404{
2405 if (m_nInternalVertices == 0) {
2406 m_lastInternalVertexId = Vertex::NULL_ID;
2407 return;
2408 }
2409
2410 VertexIterator lastInternalVertexItr;
2411#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
2412 if (m_nGhostVertices == 0) {
2413 lastInternalVertexItr = --m_vertices.end();
2414 m_lastInternalVertexId = lastInternalVertexItr->getId();
2415 } else {
2416 m_lastInternalVertexId = m_vertices.getSizeMarker(m_nInternalVertices - 1, Vertex::NULL_ID);
2417 }
2418#else
2419 lastInternalVertexItr = --m_vertices.end();
2420 m_lastInternalVertexId = lastInternalVertexItr->getId();
2421#endif

2499 CellConstIterator endItr = m_cells.cend();
2500 for (CellConstIterator itr = beginItr; itr != endItr; ++itr) {

2502 }
2503 }

2791PatchKernel::CellIterator PatchKernel::addCell(const Cell &source, long id)

2798
2813PatchKernel::CellIterator PatchKernel::addCell(Cell &&source, long id)
2814{
2815 // Get the id
2816 if (id < 0) {
2817 id = source.getId();
2818 }
2819
2820 // Add a dummy cell
2821 //
2822 // It is not possible to directly add the source into the storage. First a
2823 // dummy cell is created and then that cell is replaced with the source.
2824 std::unique_ptr<long[]> dummyConnectStorage = std::unique_ptr<long[]>(nullptr);
2825
2826 CellIterator iterator = _addInternalCell(ElementType::UNDEFINED, std::move(dummyConnectStorage), id);
2827
2828 // Replace the newly created cell with the source
2829 //
2830 // Before replacing the newly created cell we need to set the id of the
2831 // source to the id that has been assigned to the newly created cell.
2832 source.setId(iterator->getId());
2833
2834 Cell &cell = (*iterator);
2835 cell = std::move(source);
2836
2837 return iterator;
2838}

2855PatchKernel::CellIterator PatchKernel::addCell(ElementType type, long id)
2856{
2857 std::unique_ptr<long[]> connectStorage;
2858 if (ReferenceElementInfo::hasInfo(type)) {
2859 int connectSize = ReferenceElementInfo::getInfo(type).nVertices;
2860 connectStorage = std::unique_ptr<long[]>(new long[connectSize]);
2861 } else {
2862 connectStorage = std::unique_ptr<long[]>(nullptr);
2863 }
2864
2865 return addCell(type, std::move(connectStorage), id);
2866}
2867
2884PatchKernel::CellIterator PatchKernel::addCell(ElementType type, const std::vector<long> &connectivity,
2885 long id)
2886{
2887 int connectSize = connectivity.size();
2888 std::unique_ptr<long[]> connectStorage = std::unique_ptr<long[]>(new long[connectSize]);
2889 std::copy(connectivity.data(), connectivity.data() + connectSize, connectStorage.get());
2890
2891 return addCell(type, std::move(connectStorage), id);
2892}

2911PatchKernel::CellIterator PatchKernel::addCell(ElementType type, std::unique_ptr<long[]> &&connectStorage,
2912 long id)
2913{
2914 if (!isExpert()) {
2915 return cellEnd();
2916 }
2917
2918 if (Cell::getDimension(type) > getDimension()) {
2919 return cellEnd();
2920 }
2921
2922 CellIterator iterator = _addInternalCell(type, std::move(connectStorage), id);
2923
2924 return iterator;
2925}
2926
2943PatchKernel::CellIterator PatchKernel::_addInternalCell(ElementType type, std::unique_ptr<long[]> &&connectStorage,
2944 long id)
2945{
2946 // Get the id of the cell
2947 if (m_cellIdGenerator) {
2948 if (id < 0) {
2949 id = m_cellIdGenerator->generate();
2950 } else {
2951 m_cellIdGenerator->setAssigned(id);
2952 }
2953 } else if (id < 0) {
2954 throw std::runtime_error("No valid id has been provided for the cell.");
2955 }
2956
2957 // Get the id of the cell before which the new cell should be inserted
2958#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
2959 //
2960 // If there are ghosts cells, the internal cell should be inserted
2961 // before the first ghost cell.
2962#endif
2963 long referenceId;
2964#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
2965 referenceId = m_firstGhostCellId;
2966#else
2967 referenceId = Cell::NULL_ID;
2968#endif
2969
2970 // Create the cell
2971 bool storeInterfaces = (getInterfacesBuildStrategy() != INTERFACES_NONE);
2972 bool storeAdjacencies = storeInterfaces || (getAdjacenciesBuildStrategy() != ADJACENCIES_NONE);
2973
2974 CellIterator iterator;
2975 if (referenceId == Cell::NULL_ID) {
2976 iterator = m_cells.emreclaim(id, id, type, std::move(connectStorage), true, storeInterfaces, storeAdjacencies);
2977 } else {
2978 iterator = m_cells.emreclaimBefore(referenceId, id, id, type, std::move(connectStorage), true, storeInterfaces, storeAdjacencies);
2979 }
2980 m_nInternalCells++;
2981
2982 // Update the id of the last internal cell
2983 if (m_lastInternalCellId < 0) {
2984 m_lastInternalCellId = id;
2985 } else if (m_cells.rawIndex(m_lastInternalCellId) < m_cells.rawIndex(id)) {
2986 m_lastInternalCellId = id;
2987 }
2988
2989 // Set the alteration flags of the cell
2990 setAddedCellAlterationFlags(id);
2991
2992#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
2993 // Set partitioning information as dirty
2994 setPartitioningInfoDirty(true);
2995#endif
2996
2997 return iterator;
2998}
2999
3008void PatchKernel::setAddedCellAlterationFlags(long id)
3009{
3010 AlterationFlags flags = FLAG_NONE;
3011 if (getAdjacenciesBuildStrategy() != ADJACENCIES_NONE) {
3012 flags |= FLAG_ADJACENCIES_DIRTY;
3013 }
3014 if (getInterfacesBuildStrategy() != INTERFACES_NONE) {
3015 flags |= FLAG_INTERFACES_DIRTY;
3016 }
3017
3018 setCellAlterationFlags(id, flags);
3019}

3021#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==0
3034PatchKernel::CellIterator PatchKernel::restoreCell(ElementType type, std::unique_ptr<long[]> &&connectStorage,
3035 long id)

3037 if (!isExpert()) {
3038 return cellEnd();
3039 }
3040

3042 return cellEnd();
3043 }
3044
3045 CellIterator iterator = m_cells.find(id);
3046 if (iterator == m_cells.end()) {
3047 throw std::runtime_error("Unable to restore the specified cell: the kernel doesn't contain an entry for that cell.");
3048 }
3049
3050 _restoreInternalCell(iterator, type, std::move(connectStorage));
3051
3052 return iterator;
3053}
3054#endif
3055
3064void PatchKernel::_restoreInternalCell(const CellIterator &iterator, ElementType type,
3065 std::unique_ptr<long[]> &&connectStorage)
3066{
3067 // Restore the cell
3068 //
3069 // There is no need to set the id of the cell as assigned, because
3070 // also the index generator will be restored.
3071 bool storeInterfaces = (getInterfacesBuildStrategy() != INTERFACES_NONE);
3072 bool storeAdjacencies = storeInterfaces || (getAdjacenciesBuildStrategy() != ADJACENCIES_NONE);
3073
3074 long cellId = iterator.getId();
3075 Cell &cell = *iterator;
3076 cell.initialize(cellId, type, std::move(connectStorage), true, storeInterfaces, storeAdjacencies);
3077 m_nInternalCells++;
3078
3079 // Set the alteration flags of the cell
3080 setRestoredCellAlterationFlags(cellId);
3081}

3090 AlterationFlags flags = FLAG_NONE;
3091 if (getAdjacenciesBuildStrategy() != ADJACENCIES_NONE) {
3092 flags |= FLAG_ADJACENCIES_DIRTY;
3093 }
3094 if (getInterfacesBuildStrategy() != INTERFACES_NONE) {
3095 flags |= FLAG_INTERFACES_DIRTY;
3096 }
3097
3098 setCellAlterationFlags(id, flags);
3099}

3106bool PatchKernel::deleteCell(long id)
3107{
3108 if (!isExpert()) {
3109 return false;
3110 }
3111
3112 // Delete cell
3113#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
3114 const Cell &cell = m_cells[id];
3115 bool isInternalCell = cell.isInterior();
3116 if (isInternalCell) {
3117 _deleteInternalCell(id);
3118 } else {
3119 _deleteGhostCell(id);
3120 }
3121#else
3122 _deleteInternalCell(id);
3123#endif
3124
3125 return true;
3126}
3127
3133void PatchKernel::_deleteInternalCell(long id)
3134{
3135 // Set the alteration flags of the cell
3136 setDeletedCellAlterationFlags(id);
3137
3138 // Delete cell
3139 m_cells.erase(id, true);
3140 m_nInternalCells--;
3141 if (id == m_lastInternalCellId) {
3142 updateLastInternalCellId();
3143 }
3144
3145 // Cell id is no longer used
3146 if (m_cellIdGenerator) {
3147 m_cellIdGenerator->trash(id);
3148 }
3149}
3150
3158void PatchKernel::setDeletedCellAlterationFlags(long id)
3159{
3160 const Cell &cell = getCell(id);
3161
3162 // Set the alteration flags of the cell
3163 resetCellAlterationFlags(id, FLAG_DELETED);
3164
3165 // Set the alteration flags of the adjacent cells
3166 const int nCellAdjacencies = cell.getAdjacencyCount();
3167 const long *cellAdjacencies = cell.getAdjacencies();
3168 for (int k = 0; k < nCellAdjacencies; ++k) {
3169 long adjacencyId = cellAdjacencies[k];
3170 if (!testCellAlterationFlags(adjacencyId, FLAG_DELETED)) {
3171 AlterationFlags flags = FLAG_DANGLING;
3172 if (getAdjacenciesBuildStrategy() != ADJACENCIES_NONE) {
3173 flags |= FLAG_ADJACENCIES_DIRTY;
3174 }
3175 if (getInterfacesBuildStrategy() != INTERFACES_NONE) {
3176 flags |= FLAG_INTERFACES_DIRTY;
3177 }
3178
3179 setCellAlterationFlags(adjacencyId, flags);
3180 }
3181 }
3182
3183 // Set the alteration flags of the interfaces
3184 const int nCellInterfaces = cell.getInterfaceCount();
3185 const long *cellInterfaces = cell.getInterfaces();
3186 for (int k = 0; k < nCellInterfaces; ++k) {
3187 long interfaceId = cellInterfaces[k];
3188 if (!testInterfaceAlterationFlags(interfaceId, FLAG_DELETED)) {
3189 setInterfaceAlterationFlags(interfaceId, FLAG_DANGLING);
3190 }
3191 }
3192}

3201long PatchKernel::countFreeCells() const
3202{
3203 return countBorderCells();
3204}
3205
3213long PatchKernel::countBorderCells() const
3214{
3215 long nBorderCells = 0;
3216 for (const Cell &cell : m_cells) {
3217 int nCellFaces = cell.getFaceCount();
3218 for (int i = 0; i < nCellFaces; ++i) {
3219 if (cell.isFaceBorder(i)) {
3220 ++nBorderCells;
3221 break;
3222 }
3223 }
3224 }
3225
3226 return nBorderCells;
3227}
3228
3237long PatchKernel::countOrphanCells() const
3238{
3239 return findOrphanCells().size();
3240}
3241
3250std::vector<long> PatchKernel::findOrphanCells() const
3251{
3252 // Compute vertex valence
3253 std::unordered_map<long, short> vertexValence;
3254 for (const Cell &cell : m_cells) {
3255 ConstProxyVector<long> cellVertexIds = cell.getVertexIds();
3256 int nCellVertices = cellVertexIds.size();
3257 for (int j = 0; j < nCellVertices; j++) {
3258 long vertexId = cellVertexIds[j];
3259 vertexValence[vertexId] += 1;
3260 }
3261 }
3262
3263 // Loop over cells
3264 std::vector<long> orphanCells;
3265 for (const Cell &cell : m_cells) {
3266 long isIsolated = true;
3267 ConstProxyVector<long> cellVertexIds = cell.getVertexIds();
3268 int nCellVertices = cellVertexIds.size();
3269 for (int j = 0; j < nCellVertices; j++) {
3270 long vertexId = cellVertexIds[j];
3271 if (vertexValence[vertexId] > 1) {
3272 isIsolated = false;
3273 break;
3274 }
3275 }
3276
3277 if (isIsolated) {
3278 orphanCells.push_back(cell.getId());
3279 }
3280 }
3281
3282 return orphanCells;
3283}
3284
3293long PatchKernel::countDuplicateCells() const
3294{
3295 return findDuplicateCells().size();
3296}
3297
3306std::vector<long> PatchKernel::findDuplicateCells() const
3307{
3308 // Define the hasher and the predicate to be used for lists of vertex ids
3309 //
3310 // These operators should be able to identify that two lists of vertex ids
3311 // are the same regardless of the order in which the ids are listed.
3312 auto hasher = [](const ConstProxyVector<long> &ids)
3313 {
3314 std::size_t hash = std::hash<long>{}(0);
3315 for (long id : ids) {
3316 hash = hash + std::hash<long>{}(id);
3317 }
3318
3319 return hash;
3320 };
3321
3322 std::unordered_map<long, std::size_t > counters;
3323 auto predicate = [&counters](const ConstProxyVector<long> &ids_A, const ConstProxyVector<long> &ids_B)
3324 {
3325 counters.clear();
3326 for (long id : ids_A) {
3327 counters[id]++;
3328 }
3329 for (long id : ids_B) {
3330 counters[id]--;
3331 }
3332
3333 for (const auto &entry : counters) {
3334 if (entry.second != 0) {
3335 return false;
3336 }
3337 }
3338
3339 return true;
3340 };
3341
3342 // Detect if there are cells that share the same list of vertices
3343 //
3344 // For each cell, the list of vertex ids is added into a set. If a collision
3345 // is detected, we have found a duplicate cell.
3346 std::vector<long> duplicateCells;
3347 std::unordered_set<ConstProxyVector<long>, decltype(hasher), decltype(predicate)> vertexStash(getCellCount(), hasher, predicate);
3348 for (const Cell &cell : m_cells) {
3349 ConstProxyVector<long> cellVertexIds = cell.getVertexIds();
3350 auto vertexStashItr = vertexStash.find(cellVertexIds);
3351 if (vertexStashItr == vertexStash.end()) {
3352 vertexStash.insert(std::move(cellVertexIds));
3353 } else {
3354 duplicateCells.push_back(cell.getId());
3355 }
3356 }
3357
3358 return duplicateCells;
3359}
3360
3364void PatchKernel::updateLastInternalCellId()
3365{
3366 if (m_nInternalCells == 0) {
3367 m_lastInternalCellId = Cell::NULL_ID;
3368 return;
3369 }
3370
3371 CellIterator lastInternalCellItr;
3372#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
3373 if (m_nGhostCells == 0) {
3374 lastInternalCellItr = --m_cells.end();
3375 m_lastInternalCellId = lastInternalCellItr->getId();
3376 } else {
3377 m_lastInternalCellId = m_cells.getSizeMarker(m_nInternalCells - 1, Cell::NULL_ID);
3378 }
3379#else
3380 lastInternalCellItr = --m_cells.end();
3381 m_lastInternalCellId = lastInternalCellItr->getId();
3382#endif
3383}

3468void PatchKernel::findCellNeighs(long id, int codimension, bool complete, std::vector<long> *neighs) const
3469{

3471
3472 if (codimension == 1) {
3473 findCellFaceNeighs(id, neighs);
3474 } else if (codimension == getDimension()) {
3475 findCellVertexNeighs(id, complete, neighs);
3476 } else if (codimension == 2) {
3477 findCellEdgeNeighs(id, complete, neighs);
3478 }

3509void PatchKernel::_findCellNeighs(long id, const std::vector<long> *blackList, std::vector<long> *neighs) const
3510{
3511 // Some patches can work (at least partially) without initializing the
3512 // cell list. To handle those patches, if there are no cells the vertex
3513 // count is evaluated using the ReferenceElementInfo associated to the cell.
3514 int nCellVertices;
3515 if (m_cells.size() == 0) {
3516 ElementType cellType = getCellType(id);
3517 const ReferenceElementInfo &cellTypeInfo = ReferenceElementInfo::getInfo(cellType);
3518 nCellVertices = cellTypeInfo.nVertices;
3519 } else {
3520 const Cell &cell = getCell(id);
3521 nCellVertices = cell.getVertexCount();
3522 }
3523
3524 for (int i = 0; i < nCellVertices; ++i) {
3525 _findCellVertexNeighs(id, i, blackList, neighs);
3526 }
3527}

3538void PatchKernel::findCellFaceNeighs(long id, std::vector<long> *neighs) const
3539{
3540 // Some patches can work (at least partially) without initializing the
3541 // cell list. To handle those patches, if there are no cells the face
3542 // count is evaluated using the ReferenceElementInfo associated to the cell.
3543 int nCellFaces;
3544 if (m_cells.size() == 0) {
3545 ElementType cellType = getCellType(id);
3546 const ReferenceElementInfo &cellTypeInfo = ReferenceElementInfo::getInfo(cellType);
3547 nCellFaces = cellTypeInfo.nFaces;
3548 } else {
3549 const Cell &cell = getCell(id);
3550 nCellFaces = cell.getFaceCount();
3551 }
3552
3553 // Get the neighbours
3554 for (int i = 0; i < nCellFaces; ++i) {
3555 _findCellFaceNeighs(id, i, nullptr, neighs);
3556 }
3557}

3602void PatchKernel::_findCellFaceNeighs(long id, int face, const std::vector<long> *blackList, std::vector<long> *neighs) const
3603{
3604 const Cell &cell = getCell(id);
3605
3606 int nFaceAdjacencies = cell.getAdjacencyCount(face);
3607 const long *faceAdjacencies = cell.getAdjacencies(face);
3608 for (int k = 0; k < nFaceAdjacencies; ++k) {
3609 long neighId = faceAdjacencies[k];
3610 if (!blackList || utils::findInOrderedVector<long>(neighId, *blackList) == blackList->end()) {
3611 utils::addToOrderedVector<long>(neighId, *neighs);
3612 }
3613 }
3614}

3634
3649void PatchKernel::findCellEdgeNeighs(long id, bool complete, std::vector<long> *neighs) const
3650{
3651 assert(isThreeDimensional());
3652 if (!isThreeDimensional()) {
3653 return;
3654 }
3655
3656 // Some patches can work (at least partially) without initializing the
3657 // cell list. To handle those patches, if there are no cells the edge
3658 // count is evaluated using the ReferenceElementInfo associated to the cell.
3659 int nCellEdges;
3660 if (m_cells.size() == 0) {
3661 ElementType cellType = getCellType(id);
3662 const ReferenceElementInfo &cellTypeInfo = ReferenceElementInfo::getInfo(cellType);
3663 nCellEdges = cellTypeInfo.nEdges;
3664 } else {
3665 const Cell &cell = getCell(id);
3666 nCellEdges = cell.getEdgeCount();
3667 }
3668
3669 // Get the neighbours
3670 std::unique_ptr<std::vector<long>> blackList;
3671 if (!complete) {
3672 blackList = std::unique_ptr<std::vector<long>>(new std::vector<long>());
3673 findCellFaceNeighs(id, blackList.get());
3674 }
3675
3676 for (int i = 0; i < nCellEdges; ++i) {
3677 _findCellEdgeNeighs(id, i, blackList.get(), neighs);
3678 }
3679}

3690std::vector<long> PatchKernel::findCellEdgeNeighs(long id, int edge) const

3692 std::vector<long> neighs;
3693 findCellEdgeNeighs(id, edge, &neighs);
3694
3695 return neighs;
3696}
3697
3710void PatchKernel::findCellEdgeNeighs(long id, int edge, std::vector<long> *neighs) const
3711{
3712 _findCellEdgeNeighs(id, edge, nullptr, neighs);
3713}
3714
3730void PatchKernel::_findCellEdgeNeighs(long id, int edge, const std::vector<long> *blackList, std::vector<long> *neighs) const
3731{
3732 assert(isThreeDimensional());
3733 if (!isThreeDimensional()) {
3734 return;
3735 }
3736
3737 const Cell &cell = getCell(id);
3738 ConstProxyVector<int> edgeVertices = cell.getEdgeLocalConnect(edge);
3739 std::size_t nEdgeVertices = edgeVertices.size();
3740 if (nEdgeVertices < 2) {
3741 return;
3742 }
3743
3744 // Find candidates neighbours
3745 //
3746 // These are the negihbours of the first vertex of the edge.
3747 const int GUESS_NEIGHS_COUNT = 3;
3748
3749 std::vector<long> candidateIds;
3750 candidateIds.reserve(GUESS_NEIGHS_COUNT);
3751 _findCellVertexNeighs(id, edgeVertices[0], blackList, &candidateIds);
3752
3753 // Discard candidates that doesn't contain the last vertex of the edge
3754 long lastEdgeVertexId = cell.getEdgeVertexId(edge, nEdgeVertices - 1);
3755
3756 ConstProxyVector<long> candidateVertexIds;
3757 for (long candidateId : candidateIds) {
3758 const Cell &candidateNeigh = m_cells.at(candidateId);
3759 candidateVertexIds = candidateNeigh.getVertexIds();
3760 std::size_t nCandidateVertices = candidateVertexIds.size();
3761
3762 bool isEdgeNeighbour = false;
3763 for (std::size_t k = 0; k < nCandidateVertices; ++k) {
3764 if (candidateVertexIds[k] == lastEdgeVertexId) {
3765 isEdgeNeighbour = true;
3766 break;
3767 }
3768 }
3769
3770 if (isEdgeNeighbour) {
3771 utils::addToOrderedVector<long>(candidateId, *neighs);
3772 }
3773 }
3774}
3775
3785std::vector<long> PatchKernel::findCellVertexNeighs(long id, bool complete) const
3786{
3787 std::vector<long> neighs;
3788 findCellVertexNeighs(id, complete, &neighs);
3789
3790 return neighs;
3791}
3792
3805void PatchKernel::findCellVertexNeighs(long id, bool complete, std::vector<long> *neighs) const
3806{
3807 // Some patches can work (at least partially) without initializing the
3808 // cell list. To handle those patches, if there are no cells the vertex
3809 // count is evaluated using the ReferenceElementInfo associated to the cell.
3810 int nCellVertices;
3811 if (m_cells.size() == 0) {
3812 ElementType cellType = getCellType(id);
3813 const ReferenceElementInfo &cellTypeInfo = ReferenceElementInfo::getInfo(cellType);
3814 nCellVertices = cellTypeInfo.nVertices;
3815 } else {
3816 const Cell &cell = getCell(id);
3817 nCellVertices = cell.getVertexCount();
3818 }
3819
3820 // Get the neighbours
3821 std::unique_ptr<std::vector<long>> blackList;
3822 if (!complete) {
3823 blackList = std::unique_ptr<std::vector<long>>(new std::vector<long>());
3824 if (isThreeDimensional()) {
3825 findCellEdgeNeighs(id, true, blackList.get());
3826 } else {
3827 findCellFaceNeighs(id, true, blackList.get());
3828 }
3829 }
3830
3831 for (int i = 0; i < nCellVertices; ++i) {
3832 _findCellVertexNeighs(id, i, blackList.get(), neighs);
3833 }
3834}

3848 return neighs;
3849}
3850
3861void PatchKernel::findCellVertexNeighs(long id, int vertex, std::vector<long> *neighs) const
3862{
3863 _findCellVertexNeighs(id, vertex, nullptr, neighs);
3864}
3865
3895void PatchKernel::_findCellVertexNeighs(long id, int vertex, const std::vector<long> *blackList, std::vector<long> *neighs) const
3896{
3897 const Cell &cell = getCell(id);
3898 long vertexId = cell.getVertexId(vertex);
3899
3900 // Since we are processing a small number of cells it's more efficient to
3901 // store the list of already processed cells in a vector instead of using
3902 // a set or an unordered_set. To speed-up the lookup, the vector is kept
3903 // sorted.
3904 const int GUESS_NEIGHS_COUNT = 8;
3905
3906 std::vector<long> alreadyProcessed;
3907 alreadyProcessed.reserve(GUESS_NEIGHS_COUNT);
3908
3909 std::vector<long> scanQueue;
3910 scanQueue.reserve(GUESS_NEIGHS_COUNT);
3911 scanQueue.push_back(id);
3912
3913 while (!scanQueue.empty()) {
3914 // Pop a cell to process
3915 long scanCellId = scanQueue.back();
3916 const Cell &scanCell = getCell(scanCellId);
3917 scanQueue.pop_back();
3918 utils::addToOrderedVector<long>(scanCell.getId(), alreadyProcessed);
3919
3920 // Get cell information
3921 const ReferenceElementInfo *scanCellInfo = nullptr;
3922 const long *scanCellConnectivity = nullptr;
3923 if (scanCell.hasInfo()) {
3924 scanCellInfo = &(scanCell.getInfo());
3925 scanCellConnectivity = scanCell.getConnect();
3926 }
3927
3928 // Use face adjacencies to find vertex negihbours
3929 int nFaces;
3930 if (scanCellInfo) {
3931 nFaces = scanCellInfo->nFaces;
3932 } else {
3933 nFaces = scanCell.getFaceCount();
3934 }
3935
3936 for (int i = 0; i < nFaces; ++i) {
3937 // Discard faces with no neighbours
3938 if (scanCell.isFaceBorder(i)) {
3939 continue;
3940 }
3941
3942 // Discard faces that don't own the vertex
3943 //
3944 // We use differents algorithm depending on whether the cell has a
3945 // reference element or not. If the cell has a reference element,
3946 // accessing the local connectivity of the face is cheap. If the
3947 // cell has no reference element, it is better to avoid using the
3948 // local connectivity of the face.
3949 //
3950 // Moreover, to optimize the search for cells that has a reference
3951 // element, we work directly on the connectivity inseatd of on the
3952 // list of vertex ids. That's because for reference elements the
3953 // connectivity is just a list of vertices.
3954 bool faceOwnsVertex = false;
3955 if (scanCellInfo) {
3956 const ReferenceElementInfo &faceInfo = ReferenceElementInfo::getInfo(scanCellInfo->faceTypeStorage[i]);
3957 const int *faceLocalConnectivity = scanCellInfo->faceConnectStorage[i].data();
3958 const int nFaceVertices = faceInfo.nVertices;
3959 for (int k = 0; k < nFaceVertices; ++k) {
3960 long faceVertexId = scanCellConnectivity[faceLocalConnectivity[k]];
3961 if (faceVertexId == vertexId) {
3962 faceOwnsVertex = true;
3963 break;
3964 }
3965 }
3966 } else {
3967 ConstProxyVector<long> faceVertexIds = scanCell.getFaceVertexIds(i);
3968 int nFaceVertices = faceVertexIds.size();
3969 for (int k = 0; k < nFaceVertices; ++k) {
3970 long faceVertexId = faceVertexIds[k];
3971 if (faceVertexId == vertexId) {
3972 faceOwnsVertex = true;
3973 break;
3974 }
3975 }
3976 }
3977
3978 if (!faceOwnsVertex) {
3979 continue;
3980 }
3981
3982 // Loop through the adjacencies
3983 //
3984 // Non-manifold patches may have faces with multiple adjacencies.
3985 int nFaceAdjacencies = scanCell.getAdjacencyCount(i);
3986 const long *faceAdjacencies = scanCell.getAdjacencies(i);
3987 for (int k = 0; k < nFaceAdjacencies; ++k) {
3988 long faceNeighId = faceAdjacencies[k];
3989
3990 // Discard neighbours that have already been processed
3991 if (utils::findInOrderedVector<long>(faceNeighId, alreadyProcessed) != alreadyProcessed.end()) {
3992 continue;
3993 }
3994
3995 // Update list of vertex neighbours
3996 if (!blackList || utils::findInOrderedVector<long>(faceNeighId, *blackList) == blackList->end()) {
3997 utils::addToOrderedVector<long>(faceNeighId, *neighs);
3998 }
3999
4000 // Update scan list
4001 scanQueue.push_back(faceNeighId);
4002 }
4003 }
4004 }
4005}

4035 utils::addToOrderedVector<long>(id, *ring);
4036}
4037
4054bool PatchKernel::findFaceNeighCell(long cellId, long neighId, int *cellFace, int *cellAdjacencyId) const
4055{
4056 const Cell &cell = getCell(cellId);
4057
4058 int nFaces = cell.getFaceCount();
4059 for (int i = 0; i < nFaces; ++i) {
4060 int nFaceAdjacencies = cell.getAdjacencyCount(i);
4061 const long *faceAdjacencies = cell.getAdjacencies(i);
4062 for (int k = 0; k < nFaceAdjacencies; ++k) {
4063 long faceNeighId = faceAdjacencies[k];
4064 if (faceNeighId < 0) {
4065 continue;
4066 } else if (faceNeighId == neighId) {
4067 *cellFace = i;
4068 *cellAdjacencyId = k;
4069 return true;
4070 }
4071 }
4072 }
4073
4074 *cellFace = -1;
4075 *cellAdjacencyId = -1;
4076
4077 return false;
4078}

4093 return list;
4094}

4130
4141void PatchKernel::findVertexOneRing(long vertexId, std::vector<long> *ring) const
4142{
4143 // Find local id of the vertex
4144 //
4145 // Coincident vertices with different ids are not supported, this case is
4146 // special because a cell may contain a point with the vertex coordinates,
4147 // but may not contain the requested vertex (because it contains one of
4148 // the other coincident vertices).
4149 const std::array<double, 3> &coords = getVertexCoords(vertexId);
4150 long cellId = locatePoint(coords);
4151 if (cellId == bitpit::Element::NULL_ID) {
4152 return;
4153 }
4154
4155 int vertexLocalId = getCell(cellId).findVertex(vertexId);
4156 assert(vertexLocalId >= 0);
4157
4158 // Find vertex one-ring
4159 findCellVertexOneRing(cellId, vertexLocalId, ring);
4160}

4186void PatchKernel::setInterfaceAutoIndexing(bool enabled)
4187{
4188 if (isInterfaceAutoIndexingEnabled() == enabled) {
4189 return;
4190 }
4191
4192 if (enabled) {
4193 createInterfaceIndexGenerator(true);
4194 } else {
4195 if (getInterfacesBuildStrategy() == INTERFACES_AUTOMATIC) {
4196 throw std::runtime_error("Auto-indexing cannot be disabled if interfaces build strategy is set to automatic.");
4197 }
4198
4199 m_interfaceIdGenerator.reset();
4200 }
4201}

4223
4232void PatchKernel::createInterfaceIndexGenerator(bool populate)
4233{
4234 // Create or reset index generator
4235 if (!m_interfaceIdGenerator) {
4236 m_interfaceIdGenerator = std::unique_ptr<IndexGenerator<long>>(new IndexGenerator<long>());
4237 } else {
4238 m_interfaceIdGenerator->reset();
4239 }
4240
4241 // Populate index generator with current ids
4242 if (populate) {
4243 InterfaceConstIterator beginItr = m_interfaces.cbegin();
4244 InterfaceConstIterator endItr = m_interfaces.cend();
4245 for (InterfaceConstIterator itr = beginItr; itr != endItr; ++itr) {
4246 m_interfaceIdGenerator->setAssigned(itr.getId());
4247 }
4248 }
4249}

4259void PatchKernel::importInterfaceIndexGenerator(const PatchKernel &source)
4260{
4261 if (source.m_interfaceIdGenerator) {
4262 m_interfaceIdGenerator = std::unique_ptr<IndexGenerator<long>>(new IndexGenerator<long>(*(source.m_interfaceIdGenerator)));
4263 } else {
4264 m_interfaceIdGenerator.reset();
4265 }

4429PatchKernel::InterfaceIterator PatchKernel::addInterface(Interface &&source, long id)
4430{
4431 // Get the id
4432 if (id < 0) {
4433 id = source.getId();
4434 }
4435
4436 // Add a dummy interface
4437 //
4438 // It is not possible to directly add the source into the storage. First
4439 // a dummy interface is created and then that interface is replaced with
4440 // the source.
4441 std::unique_ptr<long[]> dummyConnectStorage = std::unique_ptr<long[]>(nullptr);
4442
4443 InterfaceIterator iterator = _addInterface(ElementType::UNDEFINED, std::move(dummyConnectStorage), id);
4444
4445 // Replace the newly created interface with the source
4446 //
4447 // Before replacing the newly created interface we need to set the id
4448 // of the source to the id that has been assigned to the newly created
4449 // interface.
4450 source.setId(iterator->getId());
4451
4452 Interface &interface = (*iterator);
4453 interface = std::move(source);
4454
4455 return iterator;
4456}
4457
4473PatchKernel::InterfaceIterator PatchKernel::addInterface(ElementType type, long id)
4474{
4475 int connectSize = ReferenceElementInfo::getInfo(type).nVertices;
4476 std::unique_ptr<long[]> connectStorage = std::unique_ptr<long[]>(new long[connectSize]);
4477
4478 return addInterface(type, std::move(connectStorage), id);
4479}
4480
4496PatchKernel::InterfaceIterator PatchKernel::addInterface(ElementType type,
4497 const std::vector<long> &connectivity,
4498 long id)
4499{
4500 int connectSize = connectivity.size();
4501 std::unique_ptr<long[]> connectStorage = std::unique_ptr<long[]>(new long[connectSize]);
4502 std::copy(connectivity.data(), connectivity.data() + connectSize, connectStorage.get());
4503
4504 return addInterface(type, std::move(connectStorage), id);
4505}
4506
4523PatchKernel::InterfaceIterator PatchKernel::addInterface(ElementType type,
4524 std::unique_ptr<long[]> &&connectStorage,
4525 long id)
4526{
4527 if (!isExpert()) {
4528 return interfaceEnd();
4529 }
4530
4531 if (Interface::getDimension(type) > (getDimension() - 1)) {
4532 return interfaceEnd();
4533 }
4534
4535 InterfaceIterator iterator = _addInterface(type, std::move(connectStorage), id);
4536
4537 return iterator;
4538}
4539
4556PatchKernel::InterfaceIterator PatchKernel::_addInterface(ElementType type,
4557 std::unique_ptr<long[]> &&connectStorage,
4558 long id)
4559{
4560 // Get the id
4561 if (m_interfaceIdGenerator) {
4562 if (id < 0) {
4563 id = m_interfaceIdGenerator->generate();
4564 } else {
4565 m_interfaceIdGenerator->setAssigned(id);
4566 }
4567 } else if (id < 0) {
4568 throw std::runtime_error("No valid id has been provided for the interface.");
4569 }
4570
4571 // Create the interface
4572 PiercedVector<Interface>::iterator iterator = m_interfaces.emreclaim(id, id, type, std::move(connectStorage));
4573
4574 // Set the alteration flags
4575 setAddedInterfaceAlterationFlags(id);
4576
4577 return iterator;
4578}
4579
4588void PatchKernel::setAddedInterfaceAlterationFlags(long id)
4589{
4590 BITPIT_UNUSED(id);
4591}
4592
4605PatchKernel::InterfaceIterator PatchKernel::restoreInterface(ElementType type,
4606 std::unique_ptr<long[]> &&connectStorage,
4607 long id)
4608{
4609 if (!isExpert()) {
4610 return interfaceEnd();
4611 }
4612
4613 if (Interface::getDimension(type) > (getDimension() - 1)) {
4614 return interfaceEnd();
4615 }
4616
4617 InterfaceIterator iterator = m_interfaces.find(id);
4618 if (iterator == m_interfaces.end()) {
4619 throw std::runtime_error("Unable to restore the specified interface: the kernel doesn't contain an entry for that interface.");
4620 }
4621
4622 _restoreInterface(iterator, type, std::move(connectStorage));
4623
4624 return iterator;
4625}
4626
4638void PatchKernel::_restoreInterface(const InterfaceIterator &iterator, ElementType type,
4639 std::unique_ptr<long[]> &&connectStorage)
4640{
4641 // Restore the interface
4642 //
4643 // There is no need to set the id of the interfaces as assigned, because
4644 // also the index generator will be restored.
4645 long interfaceId = iterator.getId();
4646 Interface &interface = *iterator;
4647 interface.initialize(interfaceId, type, std::move(connectStorage));
4648
4649 // Set the alteration flags
4650 setRestoredInterfaceAlterationFlags(interfaceId);
4651}
4652
4658void PatchKernel::setRestoredInterfaceAlterationFlags(long id)
4659{
4660 BITPIT_UNUSED(id);
4661}
4662
4668bool PatchKernel::deleteInterface(long id)
4669{
4670 if (!isExpert()) {
4671 return false;
4672 }
4673
4674 _deleteInterface(id);
4675
4676 return true;
4677}
4678
4684void PatchKernel::_deleteInterface(long id)
4685{
4686 // Set the alteration flags
4687 setDeletedInterfaceAlterationFlags(id);
4688
4689 // Delete interface
4690 m_interfaces.erase(id, true);
4691
4692 // Interface id is no longer used
4693 if (m_interfaceIdGenerator) {
4694 m_interfaceIdGenerator->trash(id);
4695 }
4696}

4706{
4707 resetInterfaceAlterationFlags(id, FLAG_DELETED);
4708}

4729long PatchKernel::countBorderInterfaces() const
4730{
4731 long nBorderInterfaces = 0;
4732 for (const Interface &interface : m_interfaces) {

4734 ++nBorderInterfaces;
4735 }

4740
4749long PatchKernel::countOrphanInterfaces() const
4750{
4751 long nOrphanInterfaces = 0;
4752 InterfaceConstIterator endItr = interfaceConstEnd();
4753 for (InterfaceConstIterator itr = interfaceConstBegin(); itr != endItr; ++itr) {
4754 const long interfaceId = itr.getId();
4755 if (isInterfaceOrphan(interfaceId)) {
4756 ++nOrphanInterfaces;
4757 }
4758 }
4759
4760 return nOrphanInterfaces;
4761}
4762
4771std::vector<long> PatchKernel::findOrphanInterfaces() const
4772{
4773 std::vector<long> orphanInterfaces;
4774 InterfaceConstIterator endItr = interfaceConstEnd();
4775 for (InterfaceConstIterator itr = interfaceConstBegin(); itr != endItr; ++itr) {
4776 const long interfaceId = itr.getId();
4777 if (isInterfaceOrphan(interfaceId)) {
4778 orphanInterfaces.push_back(interfaceId);
4779 }
4780 }
4781
4782 return orphanInterfaces;
4783}
4784
4788bool PatchKernel::deleteOrphanInterfaces()
4789{
4790 if (!isExpert()) {
4791 return false;
4792 }
4793
4794 std::vector<long> list = findOrphanInterfaces();
4795 deleteInterfaces(list);
4796
4797 return true;
4798}
4799
4808bool PatchKernel::isInterfaceOrphan(long id) const
4809{
4810 const Interface &interface = getInterface(id);
4811
4812 // Interface is not orphan if it has an owner or a neighbour
4813 long ownerId = interface.getOwner();
4814 long neighId = interface.getNeigh();
4815 if (ownerId >= 0 && neighId >= 0) {
4816 return false;
4817 }
4818
4819 // Interface is not orphan if it's on a border face of an internal cell
4820 if (ownerId >= 0 && neighId < 0) {
4821 const Cell &owner = getCell(ownerId);
4822 if (owner.isInterior()) {
4823 return false;
4824 }
4825 }
4826
4827 return true;
4828}
4829
4835long PatchKernel::countFaces() const
4836{
4837 double nFaces = 0;
4838 for (const Cell &cell : m_cells) {
4839 int nCellFaces = cell.getFaceCount();
4840 for (int i = 0; i < nCellFaces; ++i) {
4841 if (!cell.isFaceBorder(i)) {
4842 nFaces += 1. / (cell.getAdjacencyCount(i) + 1);
4843 } else {
4844 nFaces += 1.;
4845 }
4846 }
4847 }
4848
4849 return ((long) round(nFaces));
4850}
4851
4859long PatchKernel::countFreeFaces() const
4860{
4861 return countBorderFaces();
4862}
4863
4871long PatchKernel::countBorderFaces() const
4872{
4873 long nBorderFaces = 0;
4874 for (const Cell &cell : m_cells) {
4875 int nCellFaces = cell.getFaceCount();
4876 for (int i = 0; i < nCellFaces; ++i) {
4877 if (cell.isFaceBorder(i)) {
4878 ++nBorderFaces;
4879 }
4880 }
4881 }
4882
4883 return nBorderFaces;
4884}

4891void PatchKernel::dumpVertices(std::ostream &stream) const
4892{
4893 // Dump kernel
4894 m_vertices.dumpKernel(stream);
4895
4896 // Dump vertices
4897 for (const Vertex &vertex : m_vertices) {
4898 utils::binary::write(stream, vertex.getId());
4899#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
4900 utils::binary::write(stream, getVertexOwner(vertex.getId()));
4901#else
4902 int dummyOwner = 0;
4903 utils::binary::write(stream, dummyOwner);
4904#endif
4905
4906 const std::array<double, 3> &coords = vertex.getCoords();
4907 utils::binary::write(stream, coords[0]);
4908 utils::binary::write(stream, coords[1]);
4909 utils::binary::write(stream, coords[2]);
4910 }
4911
4912 // Dump ghost/internal subdivision
4913#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
4914 utils::binary::write(stream, m_firstGhostVertexId);
4915 utils::binary::write(stream, m_lastInternalVertexId);
4916#else
4917 utils::binary::write(stream, Vertex::NULL_ID);
4918 utils::binary::write(stream, Vertex::NULL_ID);
4919#endif
4920}
4921
4927void PatchKernel::restoreVertices(std::istream &stream)
4928{
4929 // Restore kernel
4930 m_vertices.restoreKernel(stream);
4931
4932 // Enable advanced editing
4933 bool originalExpertStatus = isExpert();
4934 setExpert(true);
4935
4936 // Restore vertices
4937 long nVertices = m_vertices.size();
4938 for (long i = 0; i < nVertices; ++i) {
4939 long id;
4940 utils::binary::read(stream, id);
4941
4942#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
4943 int owner;
4944 utils::binary::read(stream, owner);
4945#else
4946 int dummyOwner;
4947 utils::binary::read(stream, dummyOwner);
4948#endif
4949
4950 std::array<double, 3> coords;
4951 utils::binary::read(stream, coords[0]);
4952 utils::binary::read(stream, coords[1]);
4953 utils::binary::read(stream, coords[2]);
4954
4955#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
4956 restoreVertex(std::move(coords), owner, id);
4957#else
4958 restoreVertex(std::move(coords), id);
4959#endif
4960 }
4961
4962 // Restore ghost/internal subdivision
4963#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
4964 utils::binary::read(stream, m_firstGhostVertexId);
4965 utils::binary::read(stream, m_lastInternalVertexId);
4966#else
4967 long dummyFirstGhostVertexId;
4968 long dummyLastInternalVertexId;
4969 utils::binary::read(stream, dummyFirstGhostVertexId);
4970 utils::binary::read(stream, dummyLastInternalVertexId);
4971#endif
4972
4973 // Set original advanced editing status
4974 setExpert(originalExpertStatus);
4975}

4982void PatchKernel::dumpCells(std::ostream &stream) const
4983{
4984 // Dump kernel
4985 m_cells.dumpKernel(stream);
4986
4987 // Dump cells
4988 for (const Cell &cell: m_cells) {
4989 utils::binary::write(stream, cell.getId());
4990 utils::binary::write(stream, cell.getPID());
4991 utils::binary::write(stream, cell.getType());
4992
4993#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
4994 utils::binary::write(stream, getCellOwner(cell.getId()));
4995 utils::binary::write(stream, getCellHaloLayer(cell.getId()));
4996#else
4997 int dummyOwner = 0;
4998 utils::binary::write(stream, dummyOwner);
4999
5000 int dummyHaloLayer = 0;
5001 utils::binary::write(stream, dummyHaloLayer);
5002#endif
5003
5004 int cellConnectSize = cell.getConnectSize();
5005 utils::binary::write(stream, cellConnectSize);
5006
5007 const long *cellConnect = cell.getConnect();
5008 for (int i = 0; i < cellConnectSize; ++i) {
5009 utils::binary::write(stream, cellConnect[i]);
5010 }
5011 }
5012
5013 // Dump ghost/internal subdivision
5014#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
5015 utils::binary::write(stream, m_firstGhostCellId);
5016 utils::binary::write(stream, m_lastInternalCellId);
5017#else
5018 utils::binary::write(stream, Cell::NULL_ID);
5019 utils::binary::write(stream, Cell::NULL_ID);
5020#endif
5021}
5022
5028void PatchKernel::restoreCells(std::istream &stream)
5029{
5030 // Restore kernel
5031 m_cells.restoreKernel(stream);
5032
5033 // Enable advanced editing
5034 bool originalExpertStatus = isExpert();
5035 setExpert(true);
5036
5037 // Restore cells
5038 long nCells = m_cells.size();
5039 for (long i = 0; i < nCells; ++i) {
5040 long id;
5041 utils::binary::read(stream, id);
5042
5043 int PID;
5044 utils::binary::read(stream, PID);
5045
5046 ElementType type;
5047 utils::binary::read(stream, type);
5048
5049#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
5050 int owner;
5051 utils::binary::read(stream, owner);
5052
5053 int haloLayer;
5054 utils::binary::read(stream, haloLayer);
5055#else
5056 int dummyOwner;
5057 utils::binary::read(stream, dummyOwner);
5058
5059 int dummyHaloLayer;
5060 utils::binary::read(stream, dummyHaloLayer);
5061#endif
5062
5063 int cellConnectSize;
5064 utils::binary::read(stream, cellConnectSize);
5065
5066 std::unique_ptr<long[]> cellConnect = std::unique_ptr<long[]>(new long[cellConnectSize]);
5067 for (int k = 0; k < cellConnectSize; ++k) {
5068 utils::binary::read(stream, cellConnect[k]);
5069 }
5070
5071 CellIterator iterator;
5072#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
5073 iterator = restoreCell(type, std::move(cellConnect), owner, haloLayer, id);
5074#else
5075 iterator = restoreCell(type, std::move(cellConnect), id);
5076#endif
5077 iterator->setPID(PID);
5078 }
5079
5080 // Restore ghost/internal subdivision
5081#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
5082 utils::binary::read(stream, m_firstGhostCellId);
5083 utils::binary::read(stream, m_lastInternalCellId);
5084#else
5085 long dummyFirstGhostCellId;
5086 long dummyLastInternalCellId;
5087 utils::binary::read(stream, dummyFirstGhostCellId);
5088 utils::binary::read(stream, dummyLastInternalCellId);
5089#endif
5090
5091 // Update adjacencies
5092 updateAdjacencies();
5093
5094 // Set original advanced editing status
5095 setExpert(originalExpertStatus);
5096}
5097
5103void PatchKernel::dumpInterfaces(std::ostream &stream) const
5104{
5105 // Early return if the interfaces are not build
5106 if (getInterfacesBuildStrategy() == INTERFACES_NONE) {
5107 return;
5108 }
5109
5110 // Dump kernel
5111 m_interfaces.dumpKernel(stream);
5112
5113 // Dump interfaces
5114 for (const Interface &interface : getInterfaces()) {
5115 utils::binary::write(stream, interface.getId());
5116
5117 utils::binary::write(stream, interface.getOwner());
5118 utils::binary::write(stream, interface.getOwnerFace());
5119
5120 long neighId = interface.getNeigh();
5121 utils::binary::write(stream, interface.getNeigh());
5122 if (neighId >= 0) {
5123 utils::binary::write(stream, interface.getNeighFace());
5124 }
5125
5126 utils::binary::write(stream, interface.getPID());
5127 }
5128}
5129
5135void PatchKernel::restoreInterfaces(std::istream &stream)
5136{
5137 // Early return if the interfaces are not build
5138 if (getInterfacesBuildStrategy() == INTERFACES_NONE) {
5139 return;
5140 }
5141
5142 // Interfaces need up-to-date adjacencies
5143 updateAdjacencies();
5144
5145 // Restore kernel
5146 m_interfaces.restoreKernel(stream);
5147
5148 // Enable advanced editing
5149 bool originalExpertStatus = isExpert();
5150 setExpert(true);
5151
5152 // Restore interfaces
5153 long nInterfaces = m_interfaces.size();
5154 for (long n = 0; n < nInterfaces; ++n) {
5155 long interfaceId;
5156 utils::binary::read(stream, interfaceId);
5157
5158 long ownerId;
5159 int ownerFace;
5160 utils::binary::read(stream, ownerId);
5161 utils::binary::read(stream, ownerFace);
5162 Cell *owner = &(m_cells.at(ownerId));
5163
5164 long neighId;
5165 int neighFace;
5166 utils::binary::read(stream, neighId);
5167 Cell *neigh;
5168 if (neighId >= 0) {
5169 utils::binary::read(stream, neighFace);
5170 neigh = &(m_cells.at(neighId));
5171 } else {
5172 neighFace = -1;
5173 neigh = nullptr;
5174 }
5175
5176 int pid;
5177 utils::binary::read(stream, pid);
5178
5179 InterfaceIterator interfaceIterator = buildCellInterface(owner, ownerFace, neigh, neighFace, interfaceId);
5180 interfaceIterator->setPID(pid);
5181 }
5182
5183 // Interfaces are now updated
5184 unsetCellAlterationFlags(FLAG_INTERFACES_DIRTY);
5185 m_alteredInterfaces.clear();
5186
5187 // Set original advanced editing status
5188 setExpert(originalExpertStatus);
5189}

5332
5336bool PatchKernel::sortVertices()
5337{
5338 if (!isExpert()) {
5339 return false;
5340 }
5341
5342 // Sort internal vertices
5343 if (m_nInternalVertices > 0) {
5344 m_vertices.sortBefore(m_lastInternalVertexId, true);
5345 updateLastInternalVertexId();
5346 }
5347
5348#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
5349 // Sort ghost cells
5350 if (m_nGhostVertices > 0) {
5351 m_vertices.sortAfter(m_firstGhostVertexId, true);
5352 updateFirstGhostVertexId();
5353 }
5354#endif
5355
5356 // Synchronize storage
5357 m_vertices.sync();
5358
5359 return true;
5360}
5361
5367bool PatchKernel::sortCells()
5368{
5369 if (!isExpert()) {
5370 return false;
5371 }
5372
5373 // Sort internal cells
5374 if (m_nInternalCells > 0) {
5375 m_cells.sortBefore(m_lastInternalCellId, true);
5376 updateLastInternalCellId();
5377 }
5378
5379#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
5380 // Sort ghost cells
5381 if (m_nGhostCells > 0) {
5382 m_cells.sortAfter(m_firstGhostCellId, true);
5383 updateFirstGhostCellId();
5384 }
5385#endif
5386
5387 // Synchronize storage
5388 m_cells.sync();
5389
5390 return true;
5391}
5392
5396bool PatchKernel::sortInterfaces()
5397{
5398 if (!isExpert()) {
5399 return false;
5400 }
5401
5402 m_interfaces.sort();
5403
5404 m_interfaces.sync();
5405
5406 return true;
5407}
5408
5413bool PatchKernel::sort()
5414{
5415 bool status = sortVertices();
5416 status |= sortCells();
5417 status |= sortInterfaces();
5418
5419 return status;
5420}

5481
5489bool PatchKernel::squeeze()
5490{
5491 bool status = true;
5492
5493 // Alteration flags
5494 if (m_alteredCells.empty()) {
5495 AlterationFlagsStorage().swap(m_alteredCells);
5496 }
5497
5498 if (m_alteredInterfaces.empty()) {
5499 AlterationFlagsStorage().swap(m_alteredInterfaces);
5500 }
5501
5502 // Vertices
5503 status |= squeezeVertices();
5504
5505 // Cells
5506 status |= squeezeCells();
5507
5508 // Interfaces
5509 status |= squeezeInterfaces();
5510
5511 return status;
5512}
